Package com.epam.services.impl

Class TransactionServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.epam.services.impl.TransactionServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
TransactionService
public class TransactionServiceImpl extends Object implements TransactionService
Transaction Service implementation with DAOFactory. It contains methods to interact with the DAO and has some business logic.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hrebenozhko Ruslan

  • Method Details

    • getUserTransaction

      public List<TransactionDTO> getUserTransaction(int userId, int page, int recordsPerPage) throws NoTransactionsFoundException, TransactionServiceException
      This method returns some(recordsPerPage) transactions of the user with specific id. With pagination.
      Specified by:
      getUserTransaction in interface TransactionService
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID to get the transaction.
      page - page to return.
      recordsPerPage - number of records to get.
      Returns:
      A list of TransactionsDTO of the user.
      Throws:
      NoTransactionsFoundException - is thrown when no transaction was found.
      TransactionServiceException - is thrown when something wrong happens in the DAO layer.

    • getUsersTransactionNumber

      public int getUsersTransactionNumber(int userId) throws TransactionServiceException
      This method returns the count of all user transactions.
      Specified by:
      getUsersTransactionNumber in interface TransactionService
      Parameters:
      userId - id of the user to get count of transaction.
      Returns:
      count of all user transactions.
      Throws:
      TransactionServiceException - is thrown when something wrong happens in the DAO layer.
